name: Prisoner Mind
description:
Escape from prison by solving puzzles and collecting items.

One day you wake up in your prisoner cell in the middle of the night and decide you've just had enough of the prisoner's life. 

To escape you must leave your cell and venture into the other areas of the prison to look for codes and items needed to escape. 

Will you be able to do it?... and what might await you outside?

We would like you to give us feedback after playing the game by accessing this LINK

Game Features
  • Involving narrative.
  • Puzzles to test your mental abilities.
  • Look around and interact with the game environment to understand more the narrative.
Controls
  •  "Z" - To interact. 
  •  "Arrow keys or WASD" - To move the player.
  •  "Shift" - To Open Inventory.
  •  "Left and Right Arrows" - To move the arrow in the Code Scene.
  • "Up and Down Arrows" - To change the numbers in the Code Scene.
  • "X" - To reset the puzzle's
Assets Used
  • GB Studio Character Pack
  • GameBoy Emporium (GBstudio)
Credits

Rodrigo Braz

Carolina Povoas

Daniel Lyubota

This game was made with GB Studio.
